Class StateScoreboard

java.lang.Object
  State
      StateScoreboard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener
public class StateScoreboard
extends State

StateScoreboard is a mode of the program that allows the user to view (and sometimes modify) scores set in StateGame StateScoreboard is a subclass of State

Author:
Ramsey Kant
